subject: Order ssn3707
description_text:
bonjour, j’ai bien reçu ma commande. j’ai un soucis de déconnections des VAM pro, ils fonctionnent 2 minute puis ne marchent plus ou alors reste bloqué en vibration. 
Le Pro X ultra est bien connecté en direct au pc sur un usb3.0.
J’utilise simhub.
cordialement
Envoyé de mon iPad

conversations.body_text: Hi ROM ROM,  If this happens, it indicates that the computer’s grounding is not reliable, possibly because a three-prong plug was not used with a three-prong wall outlet. You can refer to the post below: connect the computer case to the stand, and connect the control box to the metal screws on the pedals. This should resolve the disconnection issue.     https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding
